Prince George, Princess Charlotte and Prince Louis are set to have a 'starring role' at the Queen's Platinum Jubilee celebrations this summer.

articles.title: Pregnant Rihanna and A$AP Rocky are seen for the first time the rapper's arrest for gun charge - Daily Mail
articles.description: The rapper, 33 - born Rakim Athelaston Mayers - was arrested by the Los Angeles Police Department in connection with a November 2021 shooting in Hollywood.
articles.content:
Rihanna and A$AP Rocky put on a united front as they were seen for the first time since his recent arrest during an outing in Los Angeles on Saturday.
